A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars yet\, In 1977 I was eight years old when my dad took me to see Star Wars. The first 3 were awesome the next 3 were decent they built on the saga\, the 7th one was good\, the one that went back to show how the resistance got the Death Star plans was one of the best since Return of the Jedi. \nThis movie the last Jedi was horrible \, I was pissed at the jokes and the stupid Superman act by Leia .
